titleStmt.title: Gallathea As it was playde before the Queenes Maiestie at Greene-wiche, on Newyeeres day at night. By the Chyldren of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Charlwoode for the vviddow Broome,
